statements: SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_transactions;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM biometric_payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM biometric_payment_transactions;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 102 AND transaction_amount < 1000;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM biometric_payment_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) >= 3 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM biometric_payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM biometric_payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_date, amount, user_id FROM biometric_payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_status='Fraudulent';
SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT b.transaction_id, b.user_id, f.fraud_status FROM biometric_payment_transactions b JOIN fraud_detection f ON b.transaction_id = f.transaction_id WHERE f.fraud_status = 'Rejected';
SELECT b.user_id, b.amount, f.fraud_description FROM biometric_payment_transactions b LEFT JOIN fraud_detection f ON b.transaction_id = f.transaction_id WHERE f.fraud_id IS NULL;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM biometric_payment_transactions;
SELECT * FROM biometric_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, timestamp FROM biometric_transactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT transaction_amount, timestamp FROM biometric_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT fraud_score, fraud_reason FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_status = TRUE;
SELECT report_id, report_date, summary FROM reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM biometric_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM biometric_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT transaction_id, biometric_data FROM biometric_transactions WHERE biometric_data LIKE '%fingerprint%' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_score > 3.0 AND fraud_status = true;
SELECT report_id, report_date, analysis_result FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, biometric_type FROM biometric_data WHERE biometric_type = 'fingerprint';
SELECT user_id, transaction_time FROM payment_transactions WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_alerts WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT report_id, user_id, report_type FROM report_data ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT biometric_type, transaction_time FROM biometric_data WHERE biometric_type = 'fingerprint';
SELECT user_id, payment_amount, payment_method FROM payment_transactions WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, report_type, report_date FROM report_data WHERE report_type = 'monthly';
SELECT alert_type, alert_message, alert_time FROM fraud_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'high-risk';
SELECT * FROM biometric_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, biometric_type FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_logs WHERE fraud_type = 'credit card fraud';
SELECT report_id, report_type FROM report_generation WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM biometric_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, fingerprint_data FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_logs ORDER BY detection_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
